title: Bug 10403: Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed
OB: When creating a project, there is no confirmation or check to ensure that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
EB: When creating a project, there should be a confirmation or check to ensure that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
SR:
1. Open the project creation dialog.
2. Fill in the necessary project details.
3. Click on the 'Create' button.
4. Observe if there is a confirmation or check to ensure that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
